at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.game

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.game.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonPlayerObject, Player

    abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for every object being drawn in the game view.
